   <head>
     <title>Sprite Animators</title>

      <style> 
         body {
            background: #eeeeee;
         }

         #canvas {
            position: absolute;
            left: 0px;
            top: 20px;
            margin-left: 10px;
            background: lightskyblue;
            border: thin solid rbga(0,0,0,1.0);
            -webkit-box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 4px 4px 6px;
            -moz-box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 4px 4px 6px;
            box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 4px 4px 6px;
         }

         #explosionButton {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50px;
            top: 50px;
            padding-left: 10px;
         }
      </style>
   </head>

  <body>
      <canvas id="canvas" width="365" height="275">
        Canvas not supported
      </canvas>

      <input id="explosionButton" type="button" value="kaboom">


      <script src="/dist/4cdf8bb42630a6530e660b36deb9c3d4.js"></script>
      <script src="/dist/5af49e585f06c893331c811448c3931e.js"></script>
      <script src="/dist/bb54bac4a8a71b06bdde5ac877a364b0.js"></script>
  </body>
